headline: Former Citi Executive Sues Bank, Alleging Sexual Harassment
summary: A former  Citigroup  executive sued the bank Monday, alleging one of its top executives sexually harassed her and that its human resources department was “weaponized” against her in the aftermath.  The suit was filed in Manhattan federal court by Julia Carreon, who worked in Citi’s wealth management division until 2024.  It alleges  Andy Sieg,  Citi’s head of wealth, publicly displayed sexually charged conduct toward her and failed to refute rumors that they were having an inappropriate relationship.
